alert.note: Alert for Adams; Wells (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS NorthernIndiana (Northern Indiana and Northeastern Ohio)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 17 at 6:32PM EDT by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT NORTHEASTERN WELLS AND WEST CENTRAL ADAMS COUNTIES THROUGH 715 PM EDT... At 632 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Ossian, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... Bluffton, Ossian, Preble, Zanesville, Uniondale, Magley, Craigville, Murray, Peterson, North Oaks, Tocsin, Kingsland, and Curryville. This includes Interstate 69 in Indiana near mile marker 293. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
